title: @Riot Rioter for 1000th normal win?
body:
http://i.imgur.com/NZksYKA.png

Finally there! Going for the 1000th normal win. Any Rioters want to play a game with me?~

replies.body: W E D I D I T B O Y Z.

i know this is totally not the correct place but can someone help me out pls i made a forum to explain it pls rito :( http://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/help-support/JvThgcTf-i-got-suspended-with-no-reason-given-or-any-prior-bans-nothing

We did it boy..?
Oh, and what ever happened to the summoner showcase? And Nikasaur?
